languages.text: "Отчасти, эттфатер. Я и впрямь водил за нос худосочных ксеносов, чтобы усыпить их бдительность. Но не только".
"Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."
languages.original_text: "Отчасти, эттфатер. Я и впрямь водил за нос худосочных ксеносов, чтобы усыпить их бдительность. Но не только".

traits.locale_text: "Partly, Thegin. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Partly, Thegin. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Partly, Thegin. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

traits.locale_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «En parte, Aett-Vater. Es cierto que he atraído a esos enclenques xenos a un rastro falso para debilitar su vigilancia. Pero no es mi único motivo».
languages.original_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

traits.locale_text: «En parte, Aett-Vater. Es cierto que he atraído a esos enclenques xenos a un rastro falso para debilitar su vigilancia. Pero no es mi único motivo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “确实有一部分这个原因，狼领。没错，我误导了那些不值一提的异形，让他们放松警惕，但那并不是唯一的原因。”
languages.original_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

traits.locale_text: “确实有一部分这个原因，狼领。没错，我误导了那些不值一提的异形，让他们放松警惕，但那并不是唯一的原因。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「それもある、アエット＝ヴァテルよ。俺が彼らの警戒心を鈍らせるために、卑劣な異種族たちを誤った道に導いたのは事実だ。だがそれだけが理由ではない」
languages.original_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

traits.locale_text: 「それもある、アエット＝ヴァテルよ。俺が彼らの警戒心を鈍らせるために、卑劣な異種族たちを誤った道に導いたのは事実だ。だがそれだけが理由ではない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « En partie, aett-vater. Il est vrai que j'ai mis ces avortons de xénos sur une fausse piste pour tromper leur vigilance, mais ce n'est pas la seule raison. »
languages.original_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

traits.locale_text: « En partie, aett-vater. Il est vrai que j'ai mis ces avortons de xénos sur une fausse piste pour tromper leur vigilance, mais ce n'est pas la seule raison. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Teils, Aett-Vater. Es stimmt, dass ich den Xenos-Schwächling auf eine falsche Fährte gelockt habe, um seine Wachsamkeit zu betäuben. Doch das ist nicht der einzige Grund."
languages.original_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

traits.locale_text: "Teils, Aett-Vater. Es stimmt, dass ich den Xenos-Schwächling auf eine falsche Fährte gelockt habe, um seine Wachsamkeit zu betäuben. Doch das ist nicht der einzige Grund."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

languages.text: "Kısmen evet Aett-Vater. Dikkatlerini dağıtmak için zayıf zenoları yanlış yola soktuğum doğrudur. Fakat bunu yapmamın başka sebepleri de var."
languages.original_text: "Partly, Aett-Vater. It is true that I have led the puny xenos on a false trail to dull their vigilance. But that is not the only reason."

traits.locale_text: "Kısmen öyle Aett-Vater. Dikkatlerini bozmak için zayıf zenoları yanlış yola soktuğum doğrudur. Fakat bunu yapmamın başka bir sebebi yoktu."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
